name: Paper Chaser
description:
You are goat. Your task is to goat about, and eat the paper. You are goat.

(This was made for Mini-Jam 82: Doodle, and was made in about 30 hours. The limitation was one room, and as such I ended up learning how to make objects spawn randomly)

I had fun making this, and I hope you have fun playing this dumb little thing.

-Goat
